text: "Girl Like U" is a song by American rapper Snoop Dogg, featuring guest vocals from singer Nelly, taken from Snoop Dogg's seventh studio album R&G; (Rhythm & Gangsta): The Masterpiece (2004). The song was written by Snoop Dogg, Nelly and L.T. Hutton, with production handled by L.T. Hutton. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Chart (2004) !Peak position |- |US Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles (Billboard) | style="text- align:center;"|15 |} ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Snoop Dogg songs Category:Nelly songs Category:Songs written by Snoop Dogg Category:Songs written by Nelly Category:Songs written by L.T. Hutton Category:Song recordings produced by L.T. Hutton
title: Girl Like U
